worsted weight wool or wool blend yarn - 5 5mm us i hook - tapestry needle gauge 5 sts/in 12 7cm measurements & yardage - king size 80 x 75 in 203 2 x 190 5 cm 6 850 yards or approximately 36 100g hanks of yarn - queen size 60 x 70 in 152 4 x 177 8 cm 4 853 yards or approximately 24 100g hanks of yarn - twin size 40 x 70 in 101 6 x 117 8 cm 3 313 yards or approximately 18 100g hanks of yarn - crib size 30 x 48 in 76 2 x 121 92 cm 1 728 yards or approximately 9 100g hanks of yarn yardage note the amounts above are for the total blanket in one color to use multiple colors divide the total yardage amount by the number of colors you would like to use notes - decrease *yo insert hook into next st yo pull through once yo pull through two loops two loops remain * - repeat from * to * yo pull through remaining three loops - blo = back loop only note stitch pattern is worked in multiples of 12 + 3 for turning chain pattern king size chain 399 sts includes 3 sts for turning chain queen size chain 303 sts includes 3 sts for turning chain twin size chain 207 sts includes 3 sts for turning chain crib size chain 159 sts includes 3 sts for turning chain row 1 th - 1 double_crochet in 4 chain from hook - *3dc decrease twice 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next in next st twice * - repeat until 11 stitches remain in this row 3 double_crochet decrease twice 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in last stitch row 2 work in blo from this point on - turn work chain 3 th - 1 double_crochet in 4 chain from hook - *3dc decrease twice 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next in next st twice * - repeat until 11 stitches remain in this row 3 double_crochet decrease twice 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in last stitch - change color row 3 - repeat row 2 from this point on work 2 row per color copyright 2013 stephanie gage all rights reserved http //stephig wordpress com | www spinningcolors com
